DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal vaccine ( 13vPnC ) compare 7-valent pneumococcal vaccine ( 7vPnC ) compare immune response concomitant vaccine administer 13vPnC 7vPnC .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine With 7-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Healthy 2monthold infant . Available entire study period . Exclusion criterion : Previous vaccination vaccine start study . Known contraindication vaccination .
